This is the dummy text file which is added to make this NuGet package to be treated as project level one.
In current NuGet version there is exist problem that it treats all NuGet packages which don't have files in content or lib directories as solution level packages.

This file will be when PowerShell script in install.ps1 will be executed by NuGet.

More information about this problem can be found using the following links:
http://nuget.codeplex.com/discussions/396654
http://nuget.codeplex.com/workitem/1910
